poster.username: I am ashamed to be here

body: I would like to thank you all in the comments. Because of you I have a better understanding of the tag system here on this website now. Thank you :)
been waiting for this hentai episode

@PROTIP There is a tag for overweight males: BBM. The problem is that it's misunderstood and abused, just like DILF. BBM: Fat male, aka male version of BBW, obviously. Just like DILF is the opposite of MILF. So basically, BBM is just fat, but not inherently ugly. DILF is an attractive older guy. Both of these tags are treated as the same thing: Old guy. Btw, Double blowjob is also a misunderstood tag: It's not 2 girls sucking one cock, it's 1 girl sucking 2 cocks.

@orgasmaniac Don't get me wrong, i also like specific tags, but it's still sad to see there being 50+ tags for outfit and creatures that are rarely used, while heavily needed tags, such as ugly bastard and vanilla etc. are not being added. And yeah, you can exclude tags with a - added before it.

@orgasmaniac
If you include '-' in front of a tag, in this example something like -ugly_bastard it excludes that tag rather than includes it. It still doesn't solve the lack of a specific tag for overweight male characters, but if there's anything else you wanted to exclude it should help.

Not going to lie, but I was hoping at the end that two of the most muscular and gayest police men would have tried to arrest him rather then the two women, so that way he would get bent over and made to squeal. Not gay, just retribution.
Page 19 bottom left, she just looks like she is just done.
why the fuck it must be ugly bastard??

@Schmand well i actually like the oddly specific tags. i understand that it is hard to come up with tags but nhentai in the future will have around abhundred thousands of tags. it is sad there isnt an ugly bastard tag :( also sad that there isn't a "no tag" option wherein you can pick a tag that will not be shown in the results (i.e. ugly bastard, dickgirl on male and so on)

@ZiggyStardust Why don't we have more NTR subtags? Why don't we have a maledom tag? Why don't we have a vanilla tag? Why don't we have a slut tag? Why don't we have an interracial tag etc. etc. Because the sadpanda fag admins don't want to add any more tags for some reason even though there are obvious needed ones. Instead, there's a ton of weirdly specific tags that are almost never used but they just don't remove them and replace them with better tags.
Why don't we have an "ugly man" tag?
Policewoman is a very underrated tag IMO. Pasties are good too.
Guys, we found a gold mine.
